# Security Policy

## üö® Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security issues in Jumper seriously. We encourage you to report 
any security concerns to us as quickly as possible.

**DO NOT** open a public issue or use GitHub Discussions to report security problems.

Please send an email to `contact@jumper-app.com`.

Please include as much information as possible, including:
* A detailed description of the vulnerability.
* Clear steps to reproduce the issue.
* The affected version(s) of Carrot.

## ü§ù Our Commitment

We commit to acknowledging your report within **72 hours** and will provide 
an estimated timeline for mitigation after the initial assessment. 
We follow the principle of responsible disclosure.
